org.drip.util.internal
Class FIUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.util.internal.FIUtil

public class FIUtil
extends java.lang.Object

The FIUtil class implements utility functions meant primarily for internal DRIP modules.

Yield2DF

public static final double Yield2DF(int iFreqIn,
                                    double dblYield,
                                    double dblTime)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Calculates the discount factor from the specified frequency, yield, and accrual year fraction

Parameters:
iFreqIn - Input frequency - if zero, set to semi-annual.
dblYield - Yield
dblTime - Time in DC years
Returns:
the discount factor
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if input are invalid.

DF2Yield

public static final double DF2Yield(int iFreqIn,
                                    double dblDF,
                                    double dblTime)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Calculates the yield from the specified discount factor to the given time.

Parameters:
iFreqIn - Yield calculation frequency - defaults to semi-annual if zero.
dblDF - Discount Factor
dblTime - Time to which the yield/DF are specified
Returns:
Implied yield
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Thrown if yield cannot be computed
